title: Leukemia I'm Fine: Infographic | Question Lists | Diary
description: The first section of this book includes 10-page colorful infographic about overview of LeukemiaThe second part is 6 set of question lists which you can use as a starter guide to get an idea what you should ask your doctor or your health care team about your diagnosis and your treatment.The final part is a short summary diary where you can take note about your treatment record, your blood count tracker and your other note.This book is not a medical advice, but it is good for all leukemia patient. This can also be a good gift for your love one who diagnosed with Leukemia.
author: Natalie J.
